Index of Multiple Deprivation overall score - weighted combination of 7 domain scores
column21: Higher score = more deprived. Range typically 0-100.

column7: National rank out of 33755 LSOAs (1 = most deprived)
column21: 1 = most deprived LSOA in England. 33755 = least deprived.

column7: Overall deprivation decile (1-10). Decile 1 = most deprived 10% of areas
column21: Key summary metric. 1 = most deprived 10%. 10 = least deprived 10%.

column7: Income deprivation domain decile - measures proportion of population experiencing deprivation relating to low income
column21: Based on adults/children in income-deprived families.

column7: Employment deprivation domain decile - measures proportion of working-age population involuntarily excluded from labour market
column21: Includes unemployment and incapacity benefits claimants.

column7: Education Skills and Training domain decile - measures lack of attainment and skills in local population
column21: Covers children/young people and adult skills sub-domains.

column7: Health Deprivation and Disability domain decile - measures risk of premature death and impairment of quality of life through poor health
column21: Based on mortality rates and health conditions.

column7: Crime domain decile - measures risk of personal and material victimisation at local level
column21: Based on recorded crime rates for violence/burglary/theft/damage.

column7: Barriers to Housing and Services domain decile - measures physical and financial accessibility of housing and local services
column21: Includes geographical barriers and wider barriers sub-domains.

column7: Living Environment domain decile - measures quality of indoor and outdoor local environment
column21: Indoors = housing quality. Outdoors = air quality and road accidents.

column7: Income Deprivation Affecting Children Index (IDACI) decile - proportion of children aged 0-15 living in income deprived families
column21: Supplementary index focusing specifically on child poverty.

column7: Income Deprivation Affecting Older People Index (IDAOPI) decile - proportion of adults aged 60+ in income deprived households
column21: Supplementary index focusing specifically on older people poverty.

column7: Total population of the LSOA (mid-2022 estimate)
column21: LSOAs typically have 1000-3000 residents.
